text: Brickellia viejensis is a North American species of flowering plants in the daisy family. It is native to the Sierra Tierra Vieja in Presidio County, western Texas.Turner, B. L. 1997. The Comps of Mexico: A systematic account of the family Asteraceae, vol. 1 – Eupatorieae. Phytologia Memoirs 11: i–iv, 1–272Tropicos, Brickellia viejensis Flyr Brickellia viejensis is a perennial herb up to 60 cm (24 inches) tall.Flyr, Lowell David 1968. Sida 3(4): 253–254 ==References== viejensis Category:Flora of Texas Category:Plants described in 1968
title: Brickellia viejensis
